title: Enhancing Scientific Problem-Solving Competencies via Robust Learning Environments Based on the 4C/ID Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary scientific concepts and experience with simple experiments
context.additional_context: Project execution in smartphone-based limited technical environments, developing job-linked scientific problem-solving competencies

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex scientific problems with over 80% accuracy in a PBL environment applying the 4C/ID model.
Learners can transfer and apply science concepts acquired through project-based learning to real-world occupational situations with over 70% effectiveness.
Learners can improve their educational perspectives aligned with constructivist learning theory by over 50% through a 4-week course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
